boardgame.name: Lagoon: Land of Druids
boardgame.description: Lagoon is a game in which 1-4 players (4 play as opposing teams of 2) each lead a circle of druids to shape the fantastical world of Lagoon by harnessing the power of its magical lands to bend destiny. The landscape bristles with three divine energies. Every player action alters the balance of power among those energies, and thus the players collectively determine Lagoon_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s destiny. One divine energy shall inherit Lagoon, and the player who best served it wins!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The world is built using hexagonal tiles, and a new tile is drawn from a bag each time a druid explores a site. Site tiles are double-sided, and each side represents a different mystical site offering a unique magical power to the druids. Each site is also enchanted with one of three divine energies: Elemeen, Vowelon and Deonin. Since the two sides of a site tile are always linked to different energies, every site explored presents a choice of which energy to advance over the other two, as well as what magic will be put into the world for use by the druids. Players also strategically deploy their druids to unravel sites aligned with an energy they choose to oppose, removing such sites from the world and tipping the balance of power towards the other two energies._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The energy with the most sites in play at the end of the game becomes Lagoon's destiny, and the player who most supported that dominant energy is the winner. Support is tracked in two ways. First, whenever exploring a site and expanding an energy's reach in Lagoon, the exploring player gains a divine seed token matching the explored site's energy. These seeds can be spent in various ways over the course of the game, but any seeds of the dominant energy remaining in a player's supply at the end of the game are worth 1 point each. Secondly, whenever a player unravels a site, it is removed from play and placed in front of that player. At the end of the game, unraveled sites not matching the dominant energy are worth 2 points each._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Lagoon Land of Druids This is a brand new, shrink wrapped copy of the game. --Payments-- - PayPal is used for all online transactions - Cash is accepted for pickups from our store (see collections). --Postage (UK _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Europe)-- -UK Shipping: Included (£2 surcharge to N.I.) -Europe _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Channel Islands, please contact me for details Parcels are sent using MyHermes (though I reserve the right to change couriers at any time). This item is tracked and insured to the value of £20. If additional insurance is required please contact me to arrange (Buyer pays additional cost). I aim to dispatch all items within 72hrs of receiving payment and delivery normally takes 3-5 working days. If multiple items are bought I will combine shipping, please contact me to arrange this. I recycle packaging wherever possible to keep shipping costs as low as I am able. --Collection-- Your item can be collected from my store in Berkshire (RG45 7AD). Please contact info@thegameshunter.co.uk to arrange. Selecting this option will avoid any shipping costs. I also attend games nights in Reading and Wokingham and can bring these with me. Again this avoids shipping costs, contact me to arrange. --Returns-- If you are unhappy with the product, please contact info@thegameshunter.co.uk within 7 working days and we will attempt to resolve the matter. Unopened copies of the game that are no longer wanted can be returned, but there is a 10% restocking fee payable of the item price and the Buyer is responsible for the return shipping costs. --Multiple Purchase Discounts-- I am happy to offer discounts if multiple marketplace purchases are made. Please e-mail beforehand to discuss.

You are buying: AN IN-HAND, BRAND NEW, SEALED, 2014 KICKSTARTER EDITION, NOT EVEN IN STORES YET CARD GAME: LAGOON: LAND OF DRUIDS GAME OVERVIEW: Lagoon is a game in which 1-4 players (4 play as opposing teams of 2) each lead a circle of druids to shape the fantastical world of Lagoon by harnessing the power of its magical lands to bend destiny. The landscape bristles with three divine energies. Every player action alters the balance of power among those energies, and thus the players collectively determine Lagoon’s destiny. One divine energy shall inherit Lagoon, and the player who best served it wins! The world is built using hexagonal tiles, and a new tile is drawn from a bag each time a druid explores a site. Site tiles are double-sided, and each side represents a different mystical site offering a unique magical power to the druids. Each site is also enchanted with one of three divine energies: Elemeen, Vowelon and Deonin. Since the two sides of a site tile are always linked to different energies, every site explored presents a choice of which energy to advance over the other two, as well as what magic will be put into the world for use by the druids. Players also strategically deploy their druids to unravel sites aligned with an energy they choose to oppose, removing such sites from the world and tipping the balance of power towards the other two energies. The energy with the most sites in play at the end of the game becomes Lagoon_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s destiny, and the player who most supported that dominant energy is the winner. Support is tracked in two ways. First, whenever exploring a site and expanding an energy_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s reach in Lagoon, the exploring player gains a divine seed token matching the explored site_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s energy. These seeds can be spent in various ways over the course of the game, but any seeds of the dominant energy remaining in a player_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s supply at the end of the game are worth 1 point each. Secondly, whenever a player unravels a site, it is removed from play and placed in front of that player. At the end of the game, unraveled sites not matching the dominant energy are worth 2 points each. Thank you for looking at my listing _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Get your LAGOON: LAND OF DRUIDS EXCLUSIVE KICKSTARTER EDITION now before its to late!!!
Kickstarter edition. New in shrink.

3 Hares Games (3HG101) Lagoon is a game in which 1-4 players (4 play as opposing teams of 2) each lead a circle of druids to shape the fantastical world of Lagoon by harnessing the power of its magical lands to bend destiny. The landscape bristles with three divine energies. Every player action alters the balance of power among those energies, and thus the players collectively determine Lagoon_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s destiny. One divine energy shall inherit Lagoon, and the player who best served it wins! The world is built using hexagonal tiles, and a new tile is drawn from a bag each time a druid explores a site. Site tiles are double-sided, and each side represents a different mystical site offering a unique magical power to the druids. Each site is also enchanted with one of three divine energies: Elemeen, Vowelon and Deonin. Since the two sides of a site tile are always linked to different energies, every site explored presents a choice of which energy to advance over the other two, as well as what magic will be put into the world for use by the druids. Players also strategically deploy their druids to unravel sites aligned with an energy they choose to oppose, removing such sites from the world and tipping the balance of power towards the other two energies. The energy with the most sites in play at the end of the game becomes Lagoon_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s destiny, and the player who most supported that dominant energy is the winner. Support is tracked in two ways. First, whenever exploring a site and expanding an energy_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s reach in Lagoon, the exploring player gains a divine seed token matching the explored site_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s energy. These seeds can be spent in various ways over the course of the game, but any seeds of the dominant energy remaining in a player_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s supply at the end of the game are worth 1 point each. Secondly, whenever a player unravels a site, it is removed from play and placed in front of that player. At the end of the game, unraveled sites not matching the dominant energy are worth 2 points each.

Ich verkaufe die Lagoon: Lands of Druids Kickstarter Edition (Druid Pledge Level) inkl. aller Stretchgoals und bisher verfügbaren Promos. Das Spiel ist geöffnet, auf Vollständigkeit geprüft, aber ungespielt. Kommt aus einem tierlosen Nichtraucherhaushalt! Angegebener Preis zzgl. Versandkosten. Bezahlung per Überweisung oder bar bei Abholung in Dresden. Versandkosten trägt der Käufer, Versandart nach Wahl. Ihr erhaltet vor der Bezahlung ein Foto mit dem Spiel und einem Inhalt eurer Wahl als Nachweis. Umfasst, neben dem Hauptspiel und zugehöriger Stretchgoals, folgende Boni: - Promo: Lagoon: Land of the Druids - Forest Sentinel (BGG-Store) - Kickstarter Exclusive Holz-Tokens der Druids - Kickstarter Exclusive Promo-Tile ------------------------------------------------ I am selling a Lagoon: Lands of Druids Kickstarter Edition (Druid Pledge Level) with all stretchgoals and addons that were available during the Kickstarter campaign. Unpunched, but never played, checked for completeness. No wear and tear. Mentioned price-tag is without shipping costs. Contact me for shipping costs to your country. Payment in advance (IBAN + BIC). Prior to payment you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll receive a picture with the game and content of your choice as proof of existence. Included Addons: - Promo: Lagoon: Land of the Druids - Forest Sentinel (BGG-Store) - Kickstarter Exclusive wooden tokens for the druids - Kickstarter Exclusive Promo-Tile
